\hypertarget{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_document}{}\doxysection{Open\+XLSX\+::XLDocument Class Reference}
\label{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_document}\index{OpenXLSX::XLDocument@{OpenXLSX::XLDocument}}


This class encapsulates the concept of an excel file. It is different from the \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_workbook}{XLWorkbook}}, in that an \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_document}{XLDocument}} holds an \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_workbook}{XLWorkbook}} together with its metadata, as well as methods for opening, closing and saving the document.~\newline
{\bfseries{{\itshape The \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_document}{XLDocument}} is the entrypoint for clients using the Rapid\+XLSX library.}}}  




{\ttfamily \#include $<$XLDocument.\+hpp$>$}

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
This class encapsulates the concept of an excel file. It is different from the \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_workbook}{XLWorkbook}}, in that an \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_document}{XLDocument}} holds an \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_workbook}{XLWorkbook}} together with its metadata, as well as methods for opening, closing and saving the document.~\newline
{\bfseries{{\itshape The \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_document}{XLDocument}} is the entrypoint for clients using the Rapid\+XLSX library.}}}
